Join The Trash Revolution Today!

Trash Bot is an intelligent waste management solution designed to address the issue of littering in private spaces/organisations / universities etc. Utilizing advanced face recognition technology, the system identifies individuals disposing of garbage outside designated bins. Upon recognition, Trash Bot promptly sends an email / instant nessage to the identified person, encouraging responsible waste disposal practices. This innovative approach aims to promote cleanliness, environmental awareness, and community engagement. Trash Bot aligns seamlessly with the core principles of Swachh Bharat Abhiyaan

Key Features

TrashBot provides instant notifications, enabling immediate corrective action, which is crucial for efficiently managing waste and preventing environmental hazards.

TrashBot utilizes advanced sensor technology and machine learning algorithms to continuously monitor waste disposal activities in real-time.

Timely intervention enabled by TrashBot's real-time monitoring helps prevent environmental hazards such as pollution, contamination, and habitat destruction.

TrashBot's environmental impact is mitigated through its prioritization of energy efficiency and the utilization of low-power sensors, which collectively reduce its carbon footprint and support broader sustainability initiatives.
